class src.simulate_trace.make_pulse.MakePulse(N=256, Delta_f=None)

Bases: object

Is supposed to generate pulses based on input parameters from GaussianAmplitude, PolynomialPhase, SinusoidalPhase, RandomPhase, CustomPulse or MultiPulse. Does not work with Jax.

N

int,

Delta_f

float,

src.simulate_trace.make_trace module

class src.simulate_trace.make_trace.MakePulse(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: MakePulse

Simulates measurement traces based in input pulses. Inherits from make_pulse.MakePulse.

maketrace

None, MakeTraceFROG, MakeTraceCHIRPSCAN or MakeTrace2DSI,
